text: haey chea karpit nasa yeung ban banhchoun( banda anak noam sar) tow champoh brachacheate cheachraen chomnean moun anak( mou ham meat) . ( te puokke ban bdeseth) dau che neah yeung ban daktondakamm puokke aoy chuobabrateah nouv pheap krakhsaat ning chomngu chhuthkeat sangkhumtha puokke nung aonlomton( sarphap kamhosa)
